ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Hello All
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Holly I have a question for you being a 56 mage I was wondering where do you get the componets for the pet spells.  I was thinking about making a mage
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Holly I have a question for you being a 56 mage I was wondering where
do you get the componets for the pet spells. I was thinking about making a
mage myself and I was just wondering about that..oh yeah and also which race
do you reccomend for a mage? Thanks for any help you can give me, happy
hunting people!

Dabruiser Troll <Death Allianece>
Warrior of the 29th Season

-----Original Message-----
From: Holly [mailto:spaminthehat75@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 23, 2003 8:54 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Hello All


Hi all i am 56 mage and as far as the the adventures go i love
them...they are great aa exp even better when a 56 mage id group with
all higher lvls i got about a yellow of aa each time and took home
about 200p. Being a poor mage always soloing i forgot what team work
is like, but you really need it in LDoN. I have won about 11 lost
about 5..and those losses resulted in fools for being in the
group..so one word of advice for people never been in lost dungen..
bring your best friends and you will have a blast.



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
